name: WGJ242 - Isometric House Builder
description:
This game is for the Weekly Game Jam 242 (that’s a couple).

I have participated in one before a while ago (I don’t reccomend checking it out) so this is my second WGJ submission.

In this game you build houses and complete missions on an isometric plain. I promised I would put the controls here so here the are

🤣

(Couldn’t be asked) (just get gud)

Just so you know this game was made in Scratch and it has a clone limit which doesn’t work with the high detail mode. It’s nothing to do with computer limitations it is  just for Scratch testing and I just left it in because I am releasing it there too.
